metadata.title: Wrap Around Synthetic Ponytail One Piece Heat Resistant Magic Paste Pony Tail Long Wavy Curly Soft Silky for Women Lady Girls 24'' / 24 inch (dark red)

categorization.explanation: The product is a synthetic ponytail, which is a type of hair extension or wig. Therefore, it fits best in the 'Hair Extensions & Wigs' subcategory under 'Hair Care' in the 'Beauty & Personal Care' main category.
